version_description: - Minor Improvements

- Bug fixes
- DISCLAIMER: This app only works on iPhone 6s, 6s Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, and iPhone X

■ Area Tool measurement text now stays visible on screen for longer measurements
■ Various other fixes

Thanks for using Tape Measure™, if you enjoy using the app or have constructive feedback on a specific feature please leave us a review! This helps us make the app better for you.

Introducing Area Tool!

A new feature for Pro users - Auto snap measurements plus area calculation!

- New "How to" Video
- Various Improvements!

***
If you enjoy using Tape Measure, leave us a review!

▸ Chaining - Chains measurements together (Pro feature)
▸ Area Tool - Now accessible from the Home Screen
▸ Improved User Interface
▸ Vastly improved overall measuring accuracy and efficiency
▸ Faster environment/scene recognition

Introducing Level Tool!

You now have a bubble level in your pocket! Easily determine the levelness of a surface with your phone.

*The new level tool is for Pro users. Start your free trial today to try it out!

Announcing Tape Measure 2.0!

▸ Improved Accuracy
▸ Snapping - Easily snap measurements together
▸ Dynamic Measurement Text - Auto adjusting measurement text size & position based on where you are in your environment

If you enjoy using Tape Measure, leave us a review and share the app with your friends!
